job.title: Software Engineer III
job.description: Are you looking for an opportunity to challenge yourselfltbrgtltbrgtAt ZoomInfo our employees work hard to define new possibles and they are driven by winning ZoomInfo is a company that got to where its at today on the backs of heroic efforts over the years by our employees and we are looking for more people to contribute to those effortsltbrgtltbrgtAt our company youll see that collaboration is second nature and youll be greeted by a team of incredibly smart talented and motivated individuals who will help you define your new bestltbrgtltbrgtYoull be presented with opportunities to both personally and professionally develop as you build your career We believe that our employees love to work and love to work here and that you will like coming to work because of the sense of accomplishment you get from being a part of what were buildingltbrgtltbrgtYou are a fit for our team if you refuse to lose you seek challenges and you love to win We welcome you to join our team of ltemgtdifference makersltemgt who are people working with a passion to win togetherltbrgtltbrgtThe mission of the Web Applications Team is to build attractive and easytouse tools which provide our clients with access to indepth profiles of millions of business people and companiesltbrgtltbrgtAs a ltstronggtSoftware Engineer IIIltstronggt on the Web Applications Team you will get to explore and work with cuttingedge technologies and a tremendously large and fantastically rich data set If you like working on tough problems whether thats building systems that handle millions of customer requests per day or how to make sense of over a billion pieces of potentially correlated data ZoomInfo could be the right place for youltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtThe Opportunityltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgt ltligtWrite highvolume server applications full stackltligt ltligtBuild slick and responsive Web UI tools that can handle millions of requests a dayltligt ltligtWork with cuttingedge technology like Hadoop Solr JBoss Hibernate Angular HBase and Mongoltligt ltligtSolve interesting and challenging problems alongside a great team of engineersltligt ltligtDevelop new skills as you push your knowledge and our technology to new levelsltligt ltligtWork for a profitable growing company that works with an impressive Fortune 500 client listltligt ltbrgtltbrgtltulgtltstronggtltugtThe Requirementsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgt ltligt5 years industry experience BS in Computer Science or equivalentltligt ltligtKnowledge of and experience using ltstronggtAngular 2 and up or React and Nodejsltstronggtltligt ltligtKnowledge of Java or similar programming languages  a plusltligt ltligtHTMLCSS JavaScript  is a plusltligt ltligtExperience with any of the following J2EE JMS Hibernate Spring  is a plusltligt ltligtFamiliarity with Hadoop SolrLucene  is a plusltligt ltligtPassionate about using technology to solve interesting challengesltligt ltligtExcited to tell us why you want to work here and what kinds of challenges youre looking forltligt ltbrgtltbrgtltulgtltstronggtltugtAbout UsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtBuilt over 20 years ago ZoomInfo Powered by DiscoverOrg has helped companies achieve their most important objective profitable growth Backed by the worlds most comprehensive B2B database our platform puts sales marketing and recruiting professionals in a position to identify connect and engage with qualified prospects ZoomInfo offers unrivaled data and accuracy with contacts companies direct dials and professional movement For more information on our intelligence solution visit us at zoominfocom
